HomePage.Giải pháp truy xuất nguồn gốc nông sản m: Transparent, high-security agricultural traceability solution using Blockchain technology
HomePage.Với những tính năng cho phép: With features that build trust among unknown parties, Blockchain Ramm helps reduce the complexity of space and time-consuming, laborious procedures. Transactions can occur quickly, easily, and with high accuracy.
HomePage.Với công nghệ: With AI technology, quickly recording activities.
HomePage.Với khả năng lưu trữ: With the ability to store detailed information about the production process, you can ensure that your agricultural products comply with quality and food safety standards.
HomePage.Đặc điểm của Tobe Farm: The features of Tobe Farm are that the data stored on the Blockchain cannot be overwritten or modified. Each data block will exist permanently. Therefore, applying Blockchain technology to agriculture solves the problem of verifying information about product origin and quality.
HomePage.Các hoạt động trên Tobe Farm: All activities on Tobe Farm are automated, reducing costs from conventional manual operations. Smart contracts minimize errors in the process.
HomePage.Với những tính năng: With features that build trust among unknown parties, Blockchain Fram helps reduce the complexity of space and time-consuming, laborious procedures. Transactions can occur quickly, easily, and with high accuracy.
HomePage.Ghi chép: Record the production process, transportation, and delivery to consumers.
HomePage.Giảm thiểu rủi ro: Reduce the risk of fraud in the supply chain, automate many processes.
HomePage.Theo dõi sản phẩm: Track products throughout the supply chain, helping detect and resolve issues quickly. When a problem occurs (such as a food safety issue), Blockchain allows for fast traceability to identify and solve the source of the problem.
HomePage.Khi có sự cố xảy ra: When an issue occurs (such as a food safety problem), fast traceability identifies and resolves the source. AI technology allows for quick activity recording. Information is secure and cannot be falsified or deleted.
HomePage.Blockchain: Blockchain: The transparent future for sustainable agriculture.
HomePage.Một khi thông tin được ghi trên blockcha: Once the information is recorded on the blockchain, it ensures that the data is always accurate and reliable. It allows tracking the entire process from production, processing to distribution, helping consumers and stakeholders trace the origin transparently.
